metadata.name: Earthquake TC<rkiye 2023
metadata.image: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1024 1024'><defs><style>.c{fill:#fff;}</style></defs><rect width='1024' height='1024'/><polygon class='c' points='640 384 384 384 384 640 640 640 512 512 640 384'/></svg>
metadata.description: Cause #1 aims to raise support for the TC<rkiye Earthquake on February 6 2023. Cause #1 is non-transferable. It is a memento of your contribution. Raised amount goes to @ahbap to support the cause.
